title: ADCs when they dont like the champ their support picks
body:
Support: declares {{champion:99}} 

**2 mins later**

Support: picks {{champion:99}}

**3 mins later**

ADC: wtf lux isnt a support
Support: why didnt you say anything?
ADC: i didnt think you were serious

Translation: i was afk and wasnt watching and/or caring

If you have a problem with some supports, please look at who your support declares instead of waiting till they pick someone to complain. Thank you, that is all.

hows it good
Snare, shield, and slow. Plus killing them quickly technically helps. Hell, I've played support veigar plenty of times. Just about anybody can support somewhat decently if you ward up.

Snare, Shield, Slow, Snipes (give you adc some gold at least by their assist).  
These can all be capitalized on by items and since a few of them have some built in AP already, 1 or 2 damage items still gives you enough to insta-gib a squishy while still having the necessary or optimal support items.

Nautilus, Leona, Every tank support.

No...

Leo offers magic damage, and tankyness. She can be the teams tank, its just not necessarily the most optimal thing. 

Nautilus doesn't need AP to be effective and again, it is a tank. He can also clear waves, unlike lots of tank supports.

Braum offers resistance boosts, poke, and his amazing ice wall. 

Alistar offers a heal, used to offer AD, and can be a tank.

Shen offers shields and AA blocks. Used to offer life tap.

Taric offers invulnerability, a shield, AND a heal.

Naut and Leo are tanks, so they don't offer ONLY CC. Atleast from my POV. Because they can be the team's tank, sort of.

Also Leo does give her team some magic damage through her passive.

Sion also has his armor shred and is a tank.

Brand and Vel Koz do not work with a true support build. They might get an Eye of Watchers, but if they dont build AP they will be very unneffective.
Janna, Thresh,  Alistar

What? 

Janna offers movement speed to allies, shields to allies, damage buffs to allies, and heals to allies. 

Thresh offers insane mobility, a shield, and can be pretty tanky. 

Alistar too can be the teams' tank, while offering a heal.
Everyone who gets autofilled and is a mid main picks her or Brand.
